card_text: "Infernoid Onuncu" + "Infernoid Devyaty" + 1+ "Infernoid" monsters$NWhen this card is Fusion Summoned, you can: Apply these effects, in sequence, based on the number of materials with different names used for this card's Summon;$N●3+: Each player sends 3 cards from their Extra Deck to the GY.$N●5+: Each player sends the top 3 cards from their Deck to the GY.$N●8+: Each player returns up to 3 of their banished cards to the GY.$N●10+: Each player sends their entire hand to the GY.
